title: Sustainability - Kettering University
summary: The article emphasizes that true sustainability involves a multi-faceted approach, including resource preservation, reuse, and creation. Sustainable engineering plays a crucial role in advancing innovation while ensuring resource availability for future generations.  The article also quotes Dr. Gianfranco DiGiuseppe from Kettering University, who defines sustainability as meeting current energy needs without compromising future generations due to limited resources.

title: MoenÂ® Smart Sprinkler Controller Makes Outdoor Watering Routines Effortless, All From The Palm of Your Hand - PR Newswire
summary: Moen, a leading home water solutions company, has introduced a Smart Sprinkler Controller and Smart Wireless Soil Sensors, which use technology to optimize outdoor irrigation.  These products, designed to reduce water waste and conserve resources, can help homeowners save money and water, potentially up to 15,000 gallons annually.  The products are compatible with Moen's existing Smart Water Network, offering homeowners comprehensive control over both indoor and outdoor water usage.

title: Brands turn to traditional Chinese culture to attract young customers - China Daily
summary: Daoxiangcun, a traditional Beijing snack brand, is attracting young customers by creating new products with trendy twists while staying true to its heritage.  They are reviving lost snacks from old recipes and materials, and creating new products like rabbit cake with soybean cheese carrot fillings.  This strategy, combined with a renovated store called Location Zero, aims to tap into the Chinachic trend and appeal to a younger demographic.
product_or_process: rabbit cake with soybean cheese carrot fillings, Location Zero

title: Pure Harvest to build more indoor farms in Saudi Arabia - Verticalfarmdaily.com: global indoor farming news
summary: Nadec and Pure Harvest have partnered to establish a large-scale, sustainable food production project in Saudi Arabia, utilizing high-tech, climate-controlled farming to produce pesticide-free fruits and vegetables year-round. This initiative addresses the Kingdom's food security challenges, promotes water conservation, and aligns with the Vision 2030 goals for a more sustainable future.
official_company_name: The National Agricultural Development Company (Nadec) and Pure Harvest Smart Farms
product_or_process: High-tech, climate-controlled, sustainable food production system
